data.message: Wearable, Selfie, Drone. This project has more buzzwords than it has team members. While it might be cool technology, it's totally useless.
you don't know! because this can be a good hit for Security ;) Someone comes to steal you. You activate the drone Wearable and take fotos of the guys or a video and send it to the cloud.

Booster Gold  - the Dc Comics super hero - used to have a drone named skeet's always flying near him  , helping him and doing surveillance  , i always believed comic books have good start-up ideas  :)
Mohamed Abdel Aty: Ok then, someone make me a telepathy device so I can finally be Professor Xavier :D (instead of it being just an alias I use in games :D)

Mohamed Alaa El Din I'm pretty sure it doesn't work that way. The drone needs an anchor point to hover around. That point is the owner because they wear some kind of beacon device calling the drone. I can't just make it hover around any object unless it can track it using something.
I thought the same too. which leads me to think that not all the drone fly. it leaves an object that can identify your place ;)
